MichaelPriest

Class Herbivore

  • java.lang.Object
    • MichaelPriest.Animal
      • MichaelPriest.Herbivore

  • public class Herbivore
extends Animal
    Subclass representing a herbivore. Contains methods that simulate a typical herbivore's behaviour
    Author:
    Michael Priest
    See Also:
    Animal
